text: Ezɨ atrivim kamaghɨn mɨgei, “E bar Satrak, Mesak, ko Abetnego, men Godɨn ziam fam. God uan ensel amadazɨ a 3plan gumazir an ziam fa egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itibar akura. Me nan akam batuegha ovengan atiatingizir puvatɨ. Egha godɨn igharazitam tevimning apɨrigha an ziam feir puvatɨ. Me uan Godɨn ziamra fe.
